title: Initiative: Thrower Mode
description: Implement the game mode where the player throws treats to dogs.

title: Epic: Treat Throwing Mechanics
description: Implement the core throwing mechanic including aiming, trajectory preview, and release.

title: Implement throw aiming
description: Convert swipe gesture into throw direction and power. Show trajectory preview during swipe.
acceptance_criteria: Swipe direction determines throw angle. Swipe length/speed determines power. Optional trajectory preview shows expected path.

title: Implement treat release and flight
description: Release treat on swipe end. Treat follows physics arc to target area.
acceptance_criteria: Treat launches on swipe release. Flight looks natural and satisfying.

title: Implement tap-to-throw alternative
description: Allow tap on a dog to auto-throw a treat toward that dog (easier mode for young children).
acceptance_criteria: Tapping a dog throws a treat toward it. Accuracy has slight randomness for challenge.

title: Epic: Dog Spawning System
description: Implement dogs appearing, being available to catch treats, and exiting.

title: Implement dog spawn positions
description: Define spawn points in each location. Dogs appear at random spawn points.
acceptance_criteria: Dogs spawn at predefined positions appropriate for each location.

title: Implement dog availability window
description: Each dog is catchable for a limited time. Window shrinks as level progresses.
acceptance_criteria: Dogs have visible timer or indicator. Window duration configurable per level/difficulty.

title: Implement dog exit animations
description: Dogs exit via: hiding behind furniture, chasing a squirrel, or running off screen.
acceptance_criteria: At least 3 exit animations implemented. Exit type chosen randomly or based on location.

title: Implement dog catch reaction
description: Dogs react happily when catching a treat (animation, sound).
acceptance_criteria: Catching treat triggers happy animation and sound effect.

title: Epic: Multi-Dog Management
description: Support multiple dogs on screen simultaneously.

title: Implement multi-dog spawning
description: Spawn 1-5 dogs based on level difficulty. Manage spawn timing and positions to avoid overlap.
acceptance_criteria: Multiple dogs can be on screen. No overlapping spawn positions. Count scales with difficulty.

title: Implement dog targeting clarity
description: Ensure it is clear which dog is being targeted when multiple are on screen.
acceptance_criteria: Visual feedback shows which dog will receive the treat. No confusion with overlapping dogs.

title: Epic: Miss Detection and Mouse
description: Handle missed throws and the mouse that steals treats.

title: Implement miss detection
description: Detect when treat hits floor or goes off screen without being caught.
acceptance_criteria: Misses are detected accurately. Miss event fires for scoring/feedback.

title: Implement mouse character
description: Create mouse sprite and animations. Mouse runs out, grabs treat, runs away.
acceptance_criteria: Mouse appears on miss, animates grabbing treat, exits screen.

title: Epic: Dog Personality System
description: Give dogs distinct personalities that affect gameplay and add variety.

title: Design dog personality types
description: Define personality types: Impatient (shorter wait), Greedy (needs 2 treats), Sleepy (slower reaction), Bouncy (moves around).
acceptance_criteria: At least 4 personality types documented with gameplay effects and visual tells.

title: Implement personality visual indicators
description: Dogs show their personality through idle animations: bouncy dogs hop, sleepy dogs yawn, etc.
acceptance_criteria: Each personality has distinct visual tells. Players can recognize type at a glance.

title: Implement personality gameplay effects
description: Personalities affect catch windows, point values, and behaviors.
acceptance_criteria: Each personality plays differently. Greedy dogs worth more points but need 2 treats.

title: Configure personality mix per level
description: Early levels have easy personalities, later levels mix in challenging ones.
acceptance_criteria: Personality distribution defined per level. Gradual introduction of harder types.
